scripts.build: git checkout site && git reset --hard 678fc3c && git checkout master . && npx snowpack build && find build/* -maxdepth 0 ! -name 'index.html' ! -name 'src' -exec rm -r {} + && mv build docs; find ./* -maxdepth 0 ! -name 'docs' ! -name '.git' ! -name '.gitignore' ! -name 'node_modules' -exec rm -r {} + && touch docs/.nojekyll && echo 'recomputer.io' > docs/CNAME && git add . && git commit -m 'Built'
